message:
Run your local blockchain:
> ganache-cli --secure -u 0 -u 1 -u 2 --deterministic
Initialize the ZeppelinOS project:
> zos init zepkit
In the client directory, run the React app:
> cd client
> npm run start
Your app is running now!
More at https://github.com/zeppelinos/zepkit/tree/stable

hooks.post-unpack: npm install && cd client && npm install
